pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, June 27, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the 2018 LiUNA (Labourers' International Union of North America) Canadian Conference.

Ballroom
Fairmont Ch√¢teau Laurier
Rideau Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks
    • Media should arrive no later than 7:45 a.m.

Toronto, Ontario

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the 2018 Rotary International Convention.

Air Canada Centre
40 Bay Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive at Gate #2 no later than 10:45 a.m.

Etobicoke, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A with youth at a hiring fair hosted by Opportunity For All Youth.

Albion Library
1515 Albion Road

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for accredited media
    • For media accreditation, please contact Maxine.McDonald@MediaProfile.com
    • Media should arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.
